post.body: @aaronbailey @sarte0nil Thanks for the follows!
Patrick is no longer here. I am his evil twin brother Chad. I wear an eyepatch.
It's snowing here. I hope work went okay and will be safe on your way home.
How is your day going? More productive than mine, probably.
I am so sorry. I am so very sorry.
I don't think I can stay awake for much longer. :(
I'm broadcasting, if you care.
Say again, you're breaking up. :P
If I'm wrong about Jesus, then who's right?
I am going to be on tonight, but I will have to leave for work around 11pm.
BTW, fuck you, Doctor! Fuck you forever! http://tinyurl.com/4snw62
I am broadcasting and watching old Doctor Who clips from the 1960s.
Davros: "@#$! you, Doctor!" http://tinyurl.com/4snw62
I will slay someone. I think I just might have to slay someone, because this blind, seething rage just isn't going anywhere.
Laughter Containment FAIL! http://tinyurl.com/6lhpyp
I wish I had known about this 6 weeks ago, so I could share it with @kellygirl1986. http://frighteningprospect.com/funshit.html
What the hell, Apple? April Fool's Day isn't until April 1! You should know that! http://tinyurl.com/5wxofj
My cat, she seems to hate The Flaming Lips. Wayne Coyne scares her. He scares me a little, frankly.
I like The Flaming Lips. Their music makes me want to grin like an idiot while a man in a white suit throws confetti at me. :)
Less than 4 minutes left in my shift! Then I don't have to come down here again until Saturday night.
I do not want to hear about Jesus today or ever, thank you.
Going home to sleeeep.
<sigh> Quotation marks should "not" be used for emphasis. Stop doing it, "NOW."
Why am I quoting Foo Fighters lyrics?
What if I say I'm not like the others? What if I say I'm not just another one of your plays? You're the pretender.
The weather wasn't too bad, but it still sucked.
The is howling pretty loudly. I really wish I didn't have to go out there.
I created an infinite loop in PHP just to watch the Terminal CPU activity go up in Activity Monitor. I need a friend.
Holy crap! An Inconvenient Truth is playing on the Discovery Science channel. This is the 1st time I have seen it on TV. :)
I am broadcasting from the kitchen.
I have my car back and it's good. The clutch feels different, but I can get used to it.
I am home at last. It is 70 degrees outside and it is weird.
Heading back to my grandma's place, where I will be without Internet access until Saturday. I might lose my mind, but hey...
My relatives have wifi. Sweet.
Why Santa is a criminal. http://tr.im/2luj
I am off to visit aunts and uncles of all sorts. See you guys when I have internet access in 4 days!
This was a good, pointless Festivus. A good Festivus is a pointless one. Good night, mah tweeps!
Awesome. http://piurl.com/yT7
Why Santa is a criminal. http://tr.im/2luj
Why does today feel like a Friday? I don't get it.
